title: Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2023 (No. 26 of 2023) shall come into operation:
heading: 1. This order may be cited as the Historic and Archaeological Heritage
text_raw:
1. This order may be cited as the Historic and Archaeological Heritage 

and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2023 (Commencement) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited historic archaeological heritage miscellaneous provision act 2023 (commencement) order 2023

title: Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2023 (No. 26 of 2023) shall come into operation:
heading: 2. The 6th day of November 2023 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 6th day of November 2023 is appointed as the day on which the 
following provisions of the Historic and Archaeological Heritage and 
Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2023 (No. 26 of 2023) shall come into operation: 

(a) Chapter 5 of Part 13, other than sections 257 and 258; 

(b) 

sections 262 and 265.
text_norm: 2 6th day november 2023 appointed day following provision historic archaeological heritage miscellaneous provision act 2023 (no 26 2023) shall come operation (a) chapter 5 part 13 section 257 258 (b) section 262 265

title: Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2023 (No. 26 of 2023) shall come into operation:
heading: 3. The 1st day of January 2024 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
3. The 1st day of January 2024 is appointed as the day on which the 
following provisions of the Historic and Archaeological Heritage and 
Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2023 shall come into operation: 

(a) 

sections 257 and 258; 

(b) Chapter 7 of Part 13, insofar as it is not already commenced. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

3 November, 2023. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 10th November, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [537] 3

title: Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2023 (No. 26 of 2023) shall come into operation:
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

In exercise of the powers conferred on the Minister for Housing, Local 
Government and Heritage by section 1(7) of the Historic and Archaeological 
Heritage and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2023 (No. 26 of 2023), this Order 
appoints the days on which certain provisions of the Act come into operation. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [537]
